name: The Fiend
description: You have made a pact with a fiendish entity of the Lower Planes, gaining destructive power fueled by dark ambition.

1.name: Dark One’s Blessing
1.description: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your warlock level.

1.name: Expanded Spell List
1.description: The Fiend lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell.

6.name: Dark One’s Own Luck
6.description: You can add a d10 to an ability check or saving throw after seeing the roll but before knowing the outcome.

10.name: Fiendish Resilience
10.description: You can choose one damage type to gain resistance against until you choose a different one.

14.name: Hurl Through Hell
14.description: When you hit a creature, you can banish it briefly through the Lower Planes, dealing psychic damage.
